title: Episode 105 - Tristan Thomas Interview
itunes:title: Episode 105 - Tristan Thomas Interview
description: Another exciting interview coming your way today as we sit down with Australian 400m hurdler Tristan Thomas to talk about his amazing career in and his time at the 2012 Olympics! In one of our most personal chats to date, Tristan opens up about the unique way he got into the sport and the 'sliding doors' moment that very nearly saw him not go down the path as a runner. He also talks about his experiences at the Olympics and why he looks back on it differently, as well as the various challenges that came after his time in London. We also hear from Tristan about the athletes to watch out for at the Tokyo Olympics. It's a fun, informative and open chat you won't want to miss!
